data.lyric:
[ti:Love Is Gone]
[ar:Angesi]
[al:L o v e  i s  G o n e]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Is Gone - Angesi
[00:07.02]Composed by：Angesi
[00:14.05]Don't go tonight
[00:19.11]Stay here one more time
[00:22.66]Remind me what it's like
[00:27.22]And let's fall in love one more time
[00:34.52]I need you now by my side
[00:41.29]It tears me up when you turn me down
[00:48.17]I'm begging please just stick around
[00:55.73]I'm sorry don't leave me I want you here with me
[01:02.50]I know that your love is gone
[01:09.37]I can't breathe I'm so weak I know this isn't easy
[01:16.25]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[01:21.22]That your love is gone
[01:30.15]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[01:34.87]That your love is gone
[01:50.73]I'm sorry don't leave me I want you here with me
[01:57.35]I know that your love is gone
[02:04.30]I can't breathe I'm so weak I know this isn't easy
[02:14.57]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[02:19.47]That your love is gone
[02:26.23]That your love is gone
[02:35.17]I can't breathe I'm so weak I know this isn't easy
[02:42.66]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[02:48.83]That your love is gone
data.trans:
[ti:Love Is Gone]
[ar:Angesi]
[al:L o v e  i s  G o n e]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.02]//
[00:14.05]今夜请不要离去
[00:19.11]为我再多呆一会儿吧
[00:22.66]时刻提醒着我曾经这样美好的我们
[00:27.22]就让我们再次沉醉爱河吧
[00:34.52]此刻我需要你陪伴我身边
[00:41.29]你拒绝我的那刻 我的心仿佛支离破碎
[00:48.17]求求你 请为我留下来吧
[00:55.73]我很抱歉 请不要离开我 我只想你在我身边
[01:02.50]我知道你的爱早已消失殆尽
[01:09.37]我快要窒息 我脆弱不已 我知道这并不容易
[01:16.25]请不要对我说你的爱已消失殆尽
[01:21.22]我们之间落下帷幕
[01:30.15]请不要对我说你的爱已消失殆尽
[01:34.87]我们之间落下帷幕
[01:50.73]我很抱歉 请不要离开我 我只想你在我身边
[01:57.35]我知道你的爱早已消失殆尽
[02:04.30]我快要窒息 我脆弱不已 我知道这并不容易
[02:14.57]请不要对我说你的爱已消失殆尽
[02:19.47]我们之间落下帷幕
[02:26.23]我们之间落下帷幕
[02:35.17]我快要窒息 我脆弱不已 我知道这并不容易
[02:42.66]请不要对我说你的爱已消失殆尽
[02:48.83]我们之间落下帷幕
